Appartamento Centro Storico

Pula

Located in the heart of Pula, Appartamento Centro Storico offers bright and modern accommodation with free parking. Baia di Nora beach is 2 km away... view moreCase Vacanza Aiosardegna

Pula

Case Vacanza Aiosardegna offers rooms and apartments in the centre of Pula. This property is a short drive from the nearest beach, and 25 km away from Cagliari. All rooms and apartments feature a private entrance... view morefrom

€ 135Hotel Del Corso

Pula

Just 2.5 kilometres from the beach, this small, 3-star hotel offers cosy accommodation near Cagliari, in the centre of the town of Pula, close to Piazza del Popolo... view morefrom

€ 48Marin Hotel

Pula

Marin Hotel is just a few minutes’ walk from the lively main square in Pula, in the south of Sardinia. All rooms offer air conditioning, free Wi-Fi and a balcony or patio. Parking is free... view morefrom

€ 75Villa Alberta

Pula

Located in Pula, just 350 metres from the city centre, Villa Alberta offers a spacious garden and air conditioning in the entire property. All rooms come with an LCD TV... view morefrom
